ac.description: Indicates auth code provided by authentication server

apn.description: Authentication provider's name issuing the auth code

cis.description: Indicates URL for CoAP native cloud interface server to be registered

at.description: Indicates access token which is given in return of auth code issued by an appropriate account server

att.description: Indicates access token type, i.e. 'bearer' (0: Unknown, 1: BEARER, 2: MAC)

cps.description: Indicates the cloud registration status of the device. (0: Need to Configure, 1: Registering to CoAP Cloud, 2: Registered to CoAP Cloud, 3: Failed to Register to CoAP Cloud, 4: Publishing resources to CoAP Cloud, 5: Published resources to CoAP Cloud, 6: Failed to publish resources to CoAP Cloud, 7~254: Reserved, 255: EOF)

clec.description: Indicates a failure reason (0: No Error. 1: Failed to access CoAP Cloud server,  2: No response from CoAP Cloud server,  3: Invalid Auth Code, 4: Invalid Access Token, 5: Failed to refresh Access Token, 6: Failed to find a registered device in CoAP Cloud, 7: Failed to find a registered user in CoAP Cloud, 8~254: Reserved, 255: Unknown error)
